title.rendered: “Decisive IDF Strike: Over 10 Hamas Terrorists Eliminated in Precision Attack on Covert UNRWA School Base”

content.rendered:
IDF Spokesperson:

The IDF and the Shin Bet attacked a targeted warfare room located in a UNRWA school in Nuseirat, which had long been used by commanders in Hamas’s military wing to plan and execute terrorist attacks; more than 10 Hamas terrorists were killed in the attack.

Fighter aircraft from the Air Force attacked a precise intelligence base of Shin Bet and AMAN in collaboration with the Fire Brigade of Brigade 99, a central Hamas warfare room located in a UNRWA school in Nuseirat, where terrorists from the military wing of the terrorist organization Hamas were located.
The attack was carefully planned and executed, using precise ammunition and making every effort to avoid civilian casualties.
The attacked warfare room served as a central terror infrastructure, from which a number of terrorist attacks against IDF forces in the central strip were planned in recent weeks. The attacked Naqba’s (Hamas’s military wing) terrorists actively participated in the October 7 attack and are also responsible for ambushes and operations against our forces on the strip.
In the attack, about 15 terrorists from the strip’s terrorist organizations were killed, more than 10 of whom were associated with the terrorist organization Hamas.
The terrorist organization Hamas systematically exploits international institutions and the civilian population as human shields for terrorist actions against the State of Israel.
Attached is infographic of the warfare room that served Hamas, located in a UNRWA school: https://bit.ly/3QKLQD9.
